item.title: FEN String Parsing in Rust
item.description: I finally finished the FEN string parsing part of my chess engine after days of procrastinating and I just wanted to share my experience with everyone. So a FEN string looks like this: rnbqkbnr/pppppppp/8/8/8/8/PPPPPPPP/RNBQKBNR w KQkq - 0 1 This is the FEN string of the starting position in standard chess. It looks like random crap at first glance but trust me, this string conveys a lot of information.
